titleStmt.title: A congratulatory poem to the ministers sons, on their splendid feast, Thursday December 7th, 1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.A. for John Dunton at the Black Raven in the Poultrey.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Dunton by Wing.
